mapper.select:
SELECT t1.peptide,t1.peptide_id,t1.fit,t1.delta_m_z,t1.charge,t1.precursor_m_z, t1.modifications,t1.lons,t1.mascot_score,t1.length,t1.`start`,t1.`stop`, t1.psm,t1.pi,t1.identification_id,t2.spectrum_id,t2.protein_id,t3.protein
FROM t_peptide t1 LEFT JOIN t_pep_pro_psm_sub t2 ON (t1.peptide_id=t2.peptide_id) LEFT JOIN t_protein t3 on (t2.protein_id=t3.protein_id) where t2.protein_id=#{proteinId} GROUP BY peptide_id LIMIT #{rows},20

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t1.peptide_id) FROM t_peptide t1 LEFT JOIN t_pep_pro_psm_sub t2 ON (t1.peptide_id=t2.peptide_id) LEFT JOIN t_protein t3 ON (t2.protein_id=t3.protein_id) where t2.protein_id=#{proteinId}

SELECT t1.peptide_id,t1.peptide, t1.readablemod, t1.fit, t1.charge, t1.precursor_m_z, t1.lons, t1.mascot_score,t1.start, t1.stop, t1.identification_id, t1.psm, t1.length, t1.pi, t1.delta_m_z, t3.protein_id,t3.protein, t2.spectrum_id FROM t_peptide t1 LEFT JOIN t_pep_pro_psm_sub t2 ON (t1.peptide_id = t2.peptide_id) LEFT JOIN t_protein t3 ON (t2.protein_id=t3.protein_id) WHERE t1.peptide = #{peptide} GROUP BY peptide_id LIMIT #{rows},20

SELECT t1.peptide,t4.protein, t4.protein_id,t1.modifications, t1.psm, t1.delta_m_z,t1.length, t1.pi=0 AS 'delta_m_z',t3.subid,t3.subtitle FROM t_peptide t1 LEFT JOIN t_pep_pro_psm_sub t2 ON (t1.peptide_id=t2.peptide_id) LEFT JOIN t_subproject t3 ON (t2.subid=t3.subid) LEFT JOIN t_protein t4 ON (t2.protein_id=t4.protein_id) WHERE t3.subid=#{subId} GROUP BY peptide LIMIT #{rows},20

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT t1.peptide,t4.protein, t1.modifications, t1.psm, t1.length, t1.pi, t1.delta_m_z=0 AS 'delta_m_z',t3.subid FROM t_peptide t1 LEFT JOIN t_pep_pro_psm_sub t2 ON (t1.peptide_id=t2.peptide_id) LEFT JOIN t_subproject t3 ON (t2.subid=t3.subid) LEFT JOIN t_protein t4 ON (t2.protein_id=t4.protein_id) WHERE t3.subid=#{subId} GROUP BY peptide)t5
select delta_m_z,count(delta_m_z) from t_peptide GROUP BY delta_m_z ORDER BY count(delta_m_z) DESC limit 0,1

SELECT t2.delta_m_z FROM (SELECT DISTINCT subid,peptide_id from t_pep_pro_psm_sub) t1 LEFT JOIN t_peptide t2 ON(t1.peptide_id=t2.peptide_id) WHERE t1.subid=#{subid} GROUP BY t2.delta_m_z ORDER BY count(t2.delta_m_z) DESC

SELECT count(t2.delta_m_z) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT subid,peptide_id from t_pep_pro_psm_sub) t1 LEFT JOIN t_peptide t2 ON(t1.peptide_id=t2.peptide_id) WHERE t1.subid=#{subid} GROUP BY t2.delta_m_z ORDER BY count(t2.delta_m_z) DESC

SELECT DISTINCT (t1.peptide), t1.modifications, t1.psm, t1.length, t1.pi, t1.delta_m_z=0 AS 'delta_m_z', t3.protein FROM t_peptide t1 LEFT JOIN t_pep_pro_psm_sub t2 ON (t1.peptide_id=t2.peptide_id) LEFT JOIN t_protein t3 ON (t2.protein_id=t3.protein_id) LIMIT #{rows},20
SELECT t1.cutting_site FROM t_peptide t1 LEFT JOIN t_pep_pro_psm_sub t2 on (t1.peptide_id = t2.peptide_id) LEFT JOIN t_subproject t3 on(t2.subid = t3.subid) WHERE t3.subid = #{subid};
SELECT t2.delta_m_z FROM (SELECT DISTINCT peptide_id,subid FROM t_pep_pro_psm_sub)t1 LEFT JOIN t_peptide t2 ON (t1.peptide_id=t2.peptide_id) WHERE t1.subid=#{subid} GROUP BY t2.delta_m_z

SELECT COUNT(t2.precursor_m_z) as count FROM (SELECT DISTINCT peptide_id,subid FROM t_pep_pro_psm_sub)t1 LEFT JOIN t_peptide t2 ON (t1.peptide_id=t2.peptide_id) WHERE t1.subid=#{subid} GROUP BY t2.delta_m_z
